sys_script_include.name: UserRestrictQualifier

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_bf857563c3703a1058a9d5fc050131d6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1813832_0.UserRestrictQualifier</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>UserRestrictQualifier</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var UserRestrictQualifier = Class.create();
UserRestrictQualifier.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    getUserRestriction: function() {
        if (gs.hasRole('admin')) {
            return ''; // adminは制限なし
        }
        return 'sys_id=' + gs.getUserID(); // 操作ユーザーのみ
    },
    type: 'UserRestrictQualifier'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_komoto_ryota</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-31 05:21:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>bf857563c3703a1058a9d5fc050131d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UserRestrictQualifier</sys_name><sys_package display_value="勤怠時間管理" source="x_1813832_0">531f7b72c334f21058a9d5fc05013198</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="勤怠時間管理">531f7b72c334f21058a9d5fc05013198</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bf857563c3703a1058a9d5fc050131d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_komoto_ryota</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-31 05:21:28</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
